mainText:
You Will Be Missed...
 
 
 	
I can't express how much of a role model Steve Jobs has been for me. Steve Jobs was and is a very inspirational guy. I LOVE all of his inventions. Without Steve Jobs I would not be able to lounge on my iPad, FaceTime with my iPhone, or send this email on my iMac. Steve Jobs you will be missed greatly and my prayers and condolances are sent out. Steve Jobs will always be remembered.
author: Brandon
